# Numerical summaries (on Whiteboards)

- Propose a dataset where the mean and median would be very different. Why? Sketch a possible visualisation.

- What is misleading with the data viz in [How contagious and deadly is it?](https://informationisbeautiful.net/visualizations/covid-19-coronavirus-infographic-datapack/)
